saying: Brothers are brothers, cheese is cheese.
description: Gonzo, the cranky koala, is a villager from the Animal Crossing series. His initial phrase, "mate," is a common way for an Australian to refer to a friend. He originally appeared in the original games up to Doubutsu no Mori e+, although he was planned to appear in Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer but was cut. He eventually returned in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo as an amiibo card villager.
